name: B-Sides
description:
B-Sides explores the intersecting stories of Zee, a non-binary college student on a road trip home for the summer, and their indie rock idol Seraph, all over the course of a fateful night in the nowhere town of Paradise.

A point-and-click adventure by elijah forbes and bryan depuy. Created for Comics x Games 2021 with the support of the Hand Eye Society.
